verses.name: Hebrews 3:10
verses.text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in their heart; and they have not known my ways.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:11
verses.text: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)

verses.name: Hebrews 3:12
verses.text: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:13
verses.text: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:14
verses.text: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;
